short_summary: Mattawa Plains and Range & Training Area at Garrison Petawawa needs overhead door maintenance service and repairs
description: The service and repairs for various types of electrical and manually operated Overhead Doors, on an as and when requested basis.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
******************************
# Government Tender Announcement
***************************************************

## Title
W6889-230161 Overhead Doors - Mattawa Plains RFSO

## Reference Number
WS4336620799-Doc4336672453

## Amendment Number
3

## Solicitation Number
WS4336620799

## Publication Date
2023-12-04

## Tender Closing Date
2024-01-23T14:00:00
(application deadline extended, refer to site visit details below)

## Amendment Date
2024-01-10

## Expected Contract Start Date
2024-02-01

## Expected Contract End Date
2026-11-30

## Category
SRV (Services)

## Type
Request for Standing Offer (RSO)

## Method of Procurement
Competitive - Open bidding

## Location
Petawawa
(tender opening into multiple locations due to the nature of the contract)

## Description

A mandatory site visit will be held on 2024-01-10 at 10:00 EST. Bidders must comply with amended procurement details where applicants are required to submit documentation and bids by January 23, 2024 at 14:00 EST to avoid non-responsive bid declaration.

**Contract Details**

* Duration: 2 years
* Scope of work: Supply labor, materials, tools and equipment for service and repairs to various types of electrical and manually operated Overhead Doors on an as-and-when basis.

**Regions included:**

* Mattawa Plains
* Range and Training Area at Garrison Petawawa
* Multiple Service locations

## Selection Criteria
Combined rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Trade Agreements
Subject to World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and multiple bilateral agreements.

**Important Contact Information**
Darlene Keenan (ethニックrelications-PWGSC)
